mapper.select: SELECT cmc_func.func_url_pre, cmc_func.func_id, cmc_func.func_name, cmc_func.func_index_url, cmc_func.p_id, cmc_func.order_num FROM cmc_user LEFT JOIN cmc_user_role_rel on (cmc_user.user_id = cmc_user_role_rel.user_id) LEFT JOIN cmc_role on (cmc_user_role_rel.role_id = cmc_role.role_id) LEFT JOIN cmc_role_func_rel on (cmc_user_role_rel.role_id = cmc_role_func_rel.role_id) LEFT JOIN cmc_func on (cmc_role_func_rel.func_id = cmc_func.func_id) where cmc_user.user_id = #{userId} and cmc_role.status=1 and cmc_func.status=1 order by cmc_func.order_num
